description: Ever heard of a one-pan lasagne? Try this recipe for a delicious zucchini lasagne made in one pan. Have this glorious vegetarian pasta ready in 30 minutes.
name: Cheatâ€™s Zucchini Lasagne Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 Odd Bunch zucchini, peeled into ribbons
375g fresh lasagne sheets, cut crossways into 4.5cm-wide strips

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a 22.5cm (6cm deep) round ovenproof frying pan over medium-high heat. Cook onion and garlic for 3 minutes, stirring, or until onion has softened. Add spinach and cook for 1 minute, stirring, or until wilted.

Combine pasta sauce and 1 1/2 cups water in a jug. Add zucchini and pasta to pan, then pour over sauce mixture and stir to coat pasta. Bring to the boil. Reduce heat to medium and simmer, covered, for 5 minutes. Uncover and simmer for 5 minutes or until pasta is just tender. Remove pan from heat.
Preheat grill to high. Scatter lasagne with bocconcini, parmesan and half of the basil. Grill for 4 minutes or until cheese is golden and has melted. Top with remaining basil, then serve.
